creator: raviyellaram@india.com
text:
Apache http server is restarting gracefully for every one hour please find the below logs for  your reference.

[Mon May 13 05:01:01 2013] [notice] Graceful restart requested, doing restart
[Mon May 13 05:01:01 2013] [error] (9)Bad file descriptor: apr_socket_accept: (client socket)
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
[Mon May 13 05:01:02 2013] [notice] Apache/2.2.11 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.2.11 OpenSSL/0.9.8b mod_jk/1.2.27 configured -- resuming normal operations
[Mon May 13 06:01:01 2013] [notice] Graceful restart requested, doing restart
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
[Mon May 13 06:01:01 2013] [error] (9)Bad file descriptor: apr_socket_accept: (client socket)
[Mon May 13 06:01:02 2013] [notice] Apache/2.2.11 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.2.11 OpenSSL/0.9.8b mod_jk/1.2.27 configured -- resuming normal operations
[Mon May 13 07:01:01 2013] [notice] Graceful restart requested, doing restart
[Mon May 13 07:01:01 2013] [error] (9)Bad file descriptor: apr_socket_accept: (client socket)
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
[Mon May 13 07:01:02 2013] [notice] Apache/2.2.11 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.2.11 OpenSSL/0.9.8b mod_jk/1.2.27 configured -- resuming normal operations
[Mon May 13 08:01:01 2013] [notice] Graceful restart requested, doing restart
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
[Mon May 13 08:01:01 2013] [error] (9)Bad file descriptor: apr_socket_accept: (client socket)
[Mon May 13 08:01:02 2013] [notice] Apache/2.2.11 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.2.11 OpenSSL/0.9.8b mod_jk/1.2.27 configured -- resuming normal operations
[Mon May 13 09:01:01 2013] [notice] Graceful restart requested, doing restart
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/www/html] does not exist
[Mon May 13 09:01:02 2013] [notice] Apache/2.2.11 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.2.11 OpenSSL/0.9.8b mod_jk/1.2.27 configured -- resuming normal operations
httpd isn't restarting itself, find the script on your system that runs hourly.
creator: covener@gmail.com
